desc: Northeast Montana prairie raised 100% grassfed, grass-finished beef cattle available in whole, half, and quarter beef shares. North of Nowhere Farm, a Nordhagen family business near Opheim Montana, also offers shipping of grassfed beef hamburger patties, all-beef hot dogs, and grassfed beef stick healthy snacks.

layout.text: Beef Raised on Prairie Grass as Nature Intended

North of Nowhere Farm is a family business located in NE Montana. Our cattle can see Canada from their grazing locations, but they are 100% American and proud of it. When you buy grass-fed beef from North of Nowhere Farm, you support our vision of healthy animals, people, community and environment.
